name: Root Rampage (HadMatter00)
description: In "Root Rampage," you play as Chef Goatspeak, a fearless chef armed with kitchen knives, who must fight against an army of sentient vegetables that have invaded the forest. The game is a twin-stick, top-down, bullet hell shooter that challenges you to dodge a constant barrage of projectiles while unleashing your own attacks on your veggie foes.
